text: Ani je kahi allahane tula pradana kele ahe, tyatuna akhiratacya gharaca sodhahi theva ani apala aihika his'sahi visaru nakosa ani jya prakare allahane tujhyavara upakara kela ahe, tu dekhila sadâ€Œvartana kara ani desata utpata (majavinya) ci iccha dharu nakosa. Niscitaca, allaha utpata (phasada) majavinaryansi prema rakhata nahi
